none: media/user/SCRAPE/test/2020-06-compassion-fatigue/extracted/Compassion Fatigue/04 On Being A First Rate Asshole

Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on June 22, 2020 Description from Terminal Escape:
There were others after this one, but I can assure you that they were no prettier...so you might as well start here. Start with "destroyed" and then dig yourself a deeper hole. If there's no hope of ever crawling out, then not trying becomes the most logical course of action. Every second in the nine minutes of sound on this tape are a struggle, but the riffs that drops in at the 0:32 mark makes me want to reach into the air and grab the band just to pull them out of the rut they are so desperately trying to crawl out of. Because, you see......they don't seem to know it's hopeless. So they are still fighting.  SIX ROTTEN AWFULS
https://compassionfatigue.bandcamp.com/album/we-really-dont-see-each-other-nearly-enough https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-D_89MHKAsxg/XvDcJiQb3GI/AAAAAAAAXeY/_Fm-5qWZkCkE_IrNgeIFVWFhGXHU4YjwwCLcBGAsYHQ/s1600/Compassion%2BFatigue%2Bimg%2Bcopy.jpg
